tool_description: Crypto Currency Data Value  API will return trade the value for pair of crypto currency. Here Fetch Coins Api will list all the existing Coins and its pair value.
name: Crypto Currency Value Data
title: Crypto Currency Value Data

api_list.name: Fetch Coin Values
api_list.description:
Fetch Coin Values Api will return the current value for the particular requested Coin Code.

Coin Code value can get from previous Fetch Coins Api.
Example - 
B-BTC_BUSD
I-BTC_INR
I-MANA_INR

etc...

api_list.name: Fetch Coins
api_list.description: This Fetch Coins API will return a list of existing Coins with Pair Value.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-currency-value-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/fetchccoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-currency-value-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-currency-value-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/fetchccoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-currency-value-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
